cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'debug_invalid' will cause logging initialization errors and potential runtime issues in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'debug_invalid'，會導致日誌初始化錯誤，並在 DU 中造成潛在的運行時問題。
